match_summary: An action-packed and high-scoring game where lostthehead stormed into an early lead with a flurry of goals. However, clannai fought back resiliently, scoring several impressive goals to level the match, which also featured some key saves and near-misses.

highlights.description: lostthehead opens the scoring with a quick interception and a low shot from outside the area that beats the diving keeper.
lostthehead scores again with a powerful shot from the center of the pitch that finds the back of the net.
Following an interception, a low shot from the lostthehead player flies past the keeper to make it three.
clannai gets one back! A well-taken shot from outside the D loops just over the goalie's head and into the net.
lostthehead responds immediately with a goal from the center of the field after intercepting the ball.
A great long-range effort from clannai, who shoot from just outside the center circle and score with a low, straight strike.
The lostthehead goalkeeper makes a great save, blocking a powerful shot taken from the center circle.
clannai scores right at the start of the clip with a quick shot from the center of the pitch.
clannai completes the comeback, scoring from the left-hand side to level the match.
A fantastic counter-attack and shot from just outside the D by lostthehead narrowly misses the top corner.
The clannai keeper makes an important save to keep the scores level.
Agonizingly close for clannai as a low, hard shot smashes against the crossbar and bounces out.

top_moments: A fantastic long-range goal from clannai, scored from outside the center circle (02:11).
clannai comes inches away from taking the lead as a powerful shot ricochets off the crossbar (10:07).
lostthehead scores a rapid-response goal from midfield immediately after an interception (01:37).
